conversation.phrase: Laziness is one of the three virtues of a programmer.
conversation.name: Me
conversation.label: Me:

conversation.phrase: Laziness is good, but it needs sensibility and brilliance to back it up, and some semblance of perfectionism to counter it.
conversation.name: Isarra

conversation-text:
Me: Laziness is one of the three virtues of a programmer.
Isarra: Laziness is good, but it needs sensibility and brilliance to back it up, and some semblance of perfectionism to counter it.
